original: @76a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @76a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i aadzny'a bi ni ba tra ga na ba ti s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i aadzny'a bi ni ba tra ga na ba ti s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Shri-ajna-vinivartana-ganapati-sadhana-nama.

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal tshogs kyi bdag po 'jur gegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal tshogs kyi bdag po 'jur gegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious sadhana of the lord of the gaṇas, the remover of obstacles, called The Practice.

original: 'phags pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble one of great compassion.

original: sems can kun la snyoms pa'i thugs rje yis //
analyzed: sems can kun la snyoms pa'i thugs rje yis //
translated: With a mind of compassion equal for all sentient beings,

original: rtag tu 'dzin byed de yi sprul pa ni //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dzin byed de yi sprul pa ni //
translated: The emanation who always holds them,

original: tshogs gyi bdag la gus pas phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: tshogs gyi bdag la gus pas phyag 'tshal te //
translated: I pay homage with devotion to the lord of the gaṇas,

original: gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bdag gis bshad par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bdag gis bshad par bya //
translated: And will explain the secret practice.

original: dang po tshogs bdag rten bzhengs pa //
analyzed: dang po tshogs bdag rten bzhengs pa //
translated: First, erecting the support for the lord of the gaṇas,

original: rta yi khru'am ras bzangs la //
analyzed: rta yi khru'am ras bzangs la //
translated: On a horse-height or fine cloth,

original: 'phags pa sku mdog gangs ltar dkar //
analyzed: 'phags pa sku mdog gangs ltar dkar //
translated: The noble one, white as snow,

original: zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa //
translated: With three faces, six arms, and four feet,

original: glang chen byi la spre'u yi zhal //
analyzed: glang chen byi la spre'u yi zhal //
translated: With the faces of an elephant, monkey, and bear,

original: phyag g-yas la bug rin chen dang // ral gri g-yon pas la du dang // chang gi thod pa dgra sta'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas la bug rin chen dang // ral gri g-yon pas la du dang // chang gi thod pa dgra sta'o //
translated: In the right hands he holds a conch, jewel, and sword, in the left a garlic, beer skull-cup, and enemy seat.

original: zhabs g-yas brkyang ba g-yon pa bskum //
analyzed: zhabs g-yas brkyang ba g-yon pa bskum //
translated: The right leg extended, the left drawn in,

original: gnyis kyis skyil krung legs par bzhugs //
analyzed: gnyis kyis skyil krung legs par bzhugs //
translated: both well seated in the cross-legged posture.

original: 'og tu lha mo dkar mo ni //
analyzed: 'og tu lha mo dkar mo ni //
translated: Below, the goddess is white,

original: spre'u yi zhal du 'phags pa yi //
analyzed: spre'u yi zhal du 'phags pa yi //
translated: with a monkey face,

original: gsang ba phyed tsam nub par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba phyed tsam nub par bya //
translated: half hidden in the secret place.

original: zhabs rten pa yi lha mo gnyis //
analyzed: zhabs rten pa yi lha mo gnyis //
translated: The two goddesses are standing on the feet,

original: yum gyi kha nas rin chen 'bab //🔽bum pa zed cing sgrub pa po'i //
analyzed: yum gyi kha nas rin chen 'bab // bum pa zed cing sgrub pa po'i //
translated: precious substances falling from the mother's mouth,🔽holding a vase, fulfilling the hopes

original: dbul ba sel zhing re ba bskong //
analyzed: dbul ba sel zhing re ba bskong //
translated: of the practitioner, removing poverty.

original: skar chen dag la bri bar bya //
analyzed: skar chen dag la bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw it on a large star,

original: de yi logs bzhir gi wang gis //
analyzed: de yi logs bzhir gi wang gis //
translated: on the four sides of that with vermillion,🔽the mantra:

original: tadya th'a / na ma:stu te ga na ba ti /
analyzed: tadya th'a / na ma:stu te ga na ba ti /
translated: Tadyathā, namaḥ stu te gaṇapati,

original: katta katta / matta matta /
analyzed: katta katta / matta matta /
translated: katta katta, matta matta,

original: ratta ratta / da ha da ha /
analyzed: ratta ratta / da ha da ha /
translated: ratta ratta, dhaha dhaha,

original: grihna grihna / panydza panydza /
analyzed: grihna grihna / panydza panydza /
translated: grihna grihna, pañja pañja,

original: na ma:stu ste /
analyzed: na ma:stu ste /
translated: namaḥ stu te gaṇapati,

original: ga na pa ti ru ru tsa na ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ga na pa ti ru ru tsa na ya sv'a h'a /
translated: ru ru cana ya svāhā.

original: aom aa bhu tra bi na bu kha mnytsa dha ra bhra ma ga tstsha ti /
analyzed: aom aa bhu tra bi na bu kha mnytsa dha ra bhra ma ga tstsha ti /
translated: Oṃ abhūta vinayā bhujaṅgadhara bhrama gacchati,

original: ha ha ya /
analyzed: ha ha ya /
translated: ha ha ya,

original: ma h'u ta ti kshi ta nan pra ye ba ye mi /🔽ku ru ku ru /
analyzed: ma h'u ta ti kshi ta nan pra ye ba ye mi / ku ru ku ru /
translated: mahā utta tikṣaṇan praveśaya me,🔽kuru kuru,🔽curu curu,

original: tsu ru tsu ru /🔽mu ru mu ru /
analyzed: tsu ru tsu ru /🔽mu ru mu ru /
translated: muru muru,

original: na mo na ma sv'a h'a /
analyzed: na mo na ma sv'a h'a /
translated: Namaḥ namaḥ svāhā.

original: tshar re ming dang spel ba bra //
analyzed: tshar re ming dang spel ba bra //
translated: Recite once, adding the name.

original: de rgyab gzungs ring bri bar bya //
analyzed: de rgyab gzungs ring bri bar bya //
translated: Behind that, write the long dhāraṇī.

original: rab tu gnas pa de yi mdun //
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa de yi mdun //
translated: In front of that consecration,

original: mandal dkar po 'dab brgyad la //
analyzed: mandal dkar po 'dab brgyad la //
translated: on a white maṇḍala with eight petals,

original: tsandan chu yis byugs pa'i steng //
analyzed: tsandan chu yis byugs pa'i steng //
translated: on top of sandalwood water,

original: me tog dkar po sil mar bkram //
analyzed: me tog dkar po sil mar bkram //
translated: scatter white flowers.🔽With beer, radish, garlic,

original: chang dang la phug la du dang // 'bras chan khur ba la sogs pas //
analyzed: chang dang la phug la du dang // 'bras chan khur ba la sogs pas //
translated: rice, and bread, and so on,

original: 'phags pa mchod la bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: 'phags pa mchod la bdag nyid ni //
translated: make offerings to the noble ones.

original: yid ma byas la sngags 'di bzlas //
analyzed: yid ma byas la sngags 'di bzlas //
translated: Without mental activity, recite this mantra:

original: aom gam @76b ga na pa ti ma ma ratna siddhi ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga na pa ti sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom gam @76b ga na pa ti ma ma ratna siddhi ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga na pa ti sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ gaṃ gaṇapati mama ratna siddhi gaga gaga gaga gaga gaga gaṇapati svāhā.

original: zhes pa grangs kyi rtags dang sbyar //
analyzed: zhes pa grangs kyi rtags dang sbyar //
translated: Conjoin this with the signs of the number.

original: zla ba gcig gis nges par 'grub //
analyzed: zla ba gcig gis nges par 'grub //
translated: It will definitely be accomplished in one month.

original: de nas sku gzugs mchod byas la //
analyzed: de nas sku gzugs mchod byas la //
translated: Then, having made offerings to the image,

original: dur du dril la mi yi rkang //
analyzed: dur du dril la mi yi rkang //
translated: wrap it in cloth, and place it on a human leg.

original: dbus su bcug la tho rangs khar //
analyzed: dbus su bcug la tho rangs khar //
translated: In the center, at dawn,

original: lags pas btsugs te gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: lags pas btsugs te gtor ma sbyin //
translated: dig it in and give a bali offering.

original: aom gam ga na pa ti ratna siddhi ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga na pa ti sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom gam ga na pa ti ratna siddhi ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga na pa ti sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ gaṇapati ratna siddhi gā gā gā gā gā gā gā gā gaṇapati svāhā.

original: aom gam ga na pa ti ba lim ta kh'a hi kh'a hi /
analyzed: aom gam ga na pa ti ba lim ta kh'a hi kh'a hi /
translated: Oṃ gaṇapati baliṃ te khāhi khāhi.

original: bdun gyis sngags la dbul bar bya //
analyzed: bdun gyis sngags la dbul bar bya //
translated: With seven [recitations] of the mantra, one should offer.

original: de nas bstod la sngags 'di bya //
analyzed: de nas bstod la sngags 'di bya //
translated: Then, for the praise, one should do this mantra:

original: aom ga na pa ti ratna ratna siddhi m'a ma roddha roddha ga na pa ti ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ka ta ka ta sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ga na pa ti ratna ratna siddhi m'a ma roddha roddha ga na pa ti ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ka ta ka ta sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ gaṇapati ratna ratna siddhi mā mara rodha rodha gaṇapati gā gā gā gā gā gā gaṇapati kata kata svāhā.

original: ga na pa ti padma na bushti ku ru ma ta ma ta sv'a h'a /🔽ga na pa ti siddhi wa sham ku ru ra tar ta sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ga na pa ti padma na bushti ku ru ma ta ma ta sv'a h'a / ga na pa ti siddhi wa sham ku ru ra tar ta sv'a h'a /
translated: Gaṇapati padma nabusthiti kuru mata mata svāhā.🔽Gaṇapati siddhi vaśaṃ kuru rataṃ ta svāhā.

original: ga na pa ti ratna boo shat grihna grihna sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ga na pa ti ratna boo shat grihna grihna sv'a h'a /
translated: Gaṇapati ratna bhoṣṭa grihna grihna svāhā.

original: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis //
translated: By reciting one hundred and eight times,

original: yid la re ba rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: yid la re ba rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: one's wishes will be fulfilled.

original: 'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid thob nas //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid thob nas //
translated: Having attained the state of a universal monarch,

original: 'bad pa med par nor rnyed 'gyur //
analyzed: 'bad pa med par nor rnyed 'gyur //
translated: one will obtain wealth without effort.

original: spogs mi dgos par 'grub 'gyur te ;
analyzed: spogs mi dgos par 'grub 'gyur te ;
translated: It will be accomplished without fail,

original: / de'i phyir gtor ma 'bad par bya //
analyzed: / de'i phyir gtor ma 'bad par bya //
translated: therefore one should make effort in the bali offering.

original: 'phags pa 'jur gegs kun sel ba'i //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jur gegs kun sel ba'i //
translated: The noble one who removes all obstacles.

original: sgrub thabs 'di brtsams dge ba des //
analyzed: sgrub thabs 'di brtsams dge ba des //
translated: By the virtue of composing this means of achievement,

original: 'jig rten nor la dbang byed cing //🔽bla med 'bras bu thob par shog /'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs 'jur gegs sel ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po aindra bh'u ti sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'jig rten nor la dbang byed cing // bla med 'bras bu thob par shog /'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs 'jur gegs sel ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po aindra bh'u ti sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: May the world rule over wealth🔽And attain the unsurpassed fruit.🔽The means of achieving the noble Gaṇapati called Removing Obstacles composed by the great master Indrabhūti is complete.

original: // / pandi ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang lo ts'a ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges yam bu karta rir legs par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang lo ts'a ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges yam bu karta rir legs par bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated well at Yambhukarṭirī by the great paṇḍita Dīpaṃkaraśrījñāna and the translator Gyatsoen Senge.
